ComicInfo.Summary: Ryan Archer returns to Earth with his Micronauts companions to find his world locked in a massive war with the forces of Baron Karza.Â With Karza's Earth invasion well under way and the team splintered and lost, it's up to Ryan Archer to re-unite them. And all he'll have to do to accomplish that is deal with Karza's genocide machines, the fearsome winged warrior called Red Falcon, his own body's mysterious molecular flux, and... his ex-girlfriend. It's wall-to-wall action and intrigue as "Invasion" continues.
ComicInfo.Title: Invasion (Part 1)
